name: Vegas SLOTS - Mermaid Queen Casino! Win Big with Gold Fish Jackpots in the Heart of Atlantis!
name_original: Vegas SLOTS - Mermaid Queen Casino! Win Big with Gold Fish Jackpots in the Heart of Atlantis!
description:
**** Download the BEST VEGAS SLOT MACHINE game FOR FREE! ****

Play BIG or play small. EVERYONE IS A WINNER at the Mermaid Queen Casino!

Get ready to enjoy the BEST slot experience available! Our gorgeously designed artwork will make your BIG WINS feel even BIGGER!

**** DOWNLOAD NOW ****

1) Undersea Quest Slots
The Mermaid Goddesses are waiting for YOU!

2) Lost Pyramid Slots
The forsaken Pyramid across the desert holds a Golden Secret!

3) Cave of Riches Slots
Light some Dynamite and dig up a Mountain of GOLD NUGGETS!

4) Big Vegas Slots
GO BIG or GO HOME at the VIP Deluxe Vegas Casino!

5) Metro S.W.AT. Slots
The Biggest Heist in American History is in progress and only has one hope!

6) Cash Farm Slots
SUPER Payouts all throughout old Leroy's CASH FARM!

TOP FEATURES:

- Huge variety of top-quality slot machines (with more being released all the time!)
- Exciting “Spin The Wheel” Bonus Game!
- Free bonus coins every hour – Collect higher coin amounts as you increase your player level!
- Progressive Daily Bonus Rewards
- Use Gems to multiply your winnings. Win more Gems with more game play
- Facebook Login
- Full Game Center integration

For help and support please contact us at: support@rialtogames.com
